description: Parking Management Services for Granville Island

full_summary:
# Contract Opportunity:

Canada Mortgage and Housing Corporation (CMHC) invites proposals for the provision of Parking Management Services on Granville Island, Vancouver, British Columbia.

## Tender Details

* **Title**: RFP-002728 - Parking Management Services (Granville Island)
* **Reference Number**: cb-194-49792908
* **Solicitation Number**: RFP-002728
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2024-07-30 at 14:00:00
* **Publication Date**: 2024-07-02
* **Amendment Date**: 2024-07-30
* **Contract Start Date**: None
* **Contract End Date**: None
* **Contract Status**: Expired

## Description

The contract is for a maximum term of five years, commencing with an initial period of up to three years, with an option to renew for one additional two-year period. The estimated value of the service provision is up to $800,000 per annum, including all applicable taxes.

The purpose of this Request for Proposal (RFP) is to engage a vendor to provide parking management services, including maintenance and repairs, on Granville Island.

## Contract Period

* **Initial Contract Period**: Up to 3 years
* **Potential Renewal Period**: 1 x 2-year period
* **Maximum Contract Duration**: 5 years

## Location

* **Granville Island**: Vancouver, British Columbia

## Services Required

The contracted services include parking facility construction, equipment installation, maintenance, and repair, as well as parking management services.

## Trade Agreements

Contractors must be registered as a vendor under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA).

## Notice

A Mandatory Site Visit will be held on July 9, 2024, at 11:00 A.M. PDT.

## For further information and tender documents, please visit:
